channel.title: IntelliJ on Oliver Wehrens
channel.description: Recent content in IntelliJ on Oliver Wehrens

item.title: IntelliJ IDEA Rulezzz with code completion
item.description: Today I got an interesting ctrl+space code completion in IDEA 8.1. Easteregg anyone ? :)

item.title: IntelliJ IDEA 8.1
item.description: I do love IntelliJ IDEA but the 8.0 release had some issues with indexing and compiler caches. Version 8.1 is out and addresses these issues (among other things, e.g. git support). Hurray.
